mapper.select: SELECT v.id, v.vindex, v.vname, v.description, v.video_url, v.price, vb.`status` FROM video v LEFT JOIN video_buy_record vb ON v.`id` = vb.`video_id` AND customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY v.id DESC LIMIT #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}
